casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A. s/b/m to Wachovia Bank, N.A. f/k/a First Union National Bank
v.
Bryan M. BAROSH and Christopher A. Barosh Petition of: Christopher A. Barosh No. 210 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 25, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
